div.ab:
They completely melt
orpiment
in a
glass
bottle
on very
hot ashes
, but it would be more appropriate to sublimate
orpiment
in a long-necked
matrass
as for making
garnets
. The
orpiment
thus turns red like
red enamel
& one needs to first grind it moist because once completely melted it is very lively & difficult to grind. Next, one can
br
thin it, once dry, with
oil
& it will make a deep yellow of heightened color. But to prevent
orpiment
from dying with the other colors & to render it compatible with these & to make it dry promptly, it is a secret held to be very rare to calcine
common salt
& to grind it in.
Vert de terre
is not used with
oil
.
